=================================
 Event simulation framework
=================================

author: John Gill

Overview
========

Simple event simulation framework

Installation / Usage
====================


To install use pip:

    $ pip install everest-climber


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/peakrisk/everest.git
    $ python setup.py install
